thread.title: BRIEF-India's Rico Auto Industries Starts Process For Partial Closure Of Dharuhera Unit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Rico Auto Industries Starts Process For Partial Closure Of Dharuhera Unit

organizations.name: brief-india's rico auto industries starts process for partial closure of dharuhera

text:
March 28 (Reuters) - Rico Auto Industries Ltd:
* COMMENCED PROCESS OF OBTAINING REQUISITE APPROVAL FROM AUTHORITIES FOR PARTIAL CLOSURE OF DHARUHERA (HARYANA) UNIT
* PRODUCTION LINES THAT ARE INTENDED TO BE CLOSED ARE NON-OPERATIONAL AS OF MARCH 28
* PRODUCTION LINES THAT ARE INTENDED TO BE CLOSED WILL HAVE POSITIVE IMPACT ON OVERALL PERFORMANCE, PROFITABILITY Source text - bit.ly/2pKB16A Further company coverage:
